title: Diagnosis log
description: A diagnosis given by a medical professional.

calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of the diagnosis

timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of the diagnosis

person_id.description: the person to whom the diagnosis applies

domain.description: one of the five dimensions of well - being(social, physical, intellectual, financial, spiritual)

diagnosis_icd10_code.description: an ICD 10 reference code from the WHO's International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems.
